monster.name: Restless Spirit
monster.languages: the Spirit understands the languages you speak, but it cannot speak itself

trait.name: Misery's Company
trait.text: The Spirit has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are frightened of it.

trait.name: Spirit Bond
trait.text: When the Spirit makes an ability check or saving throw you can use your reaction to expend a use of Bardic Inspiration and add it to its roll.

action.name: Mournful Wail
action.text: One creature of your choice within 30 feet of the Spirit that can hear it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of it for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Spectral Claw
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 + your Charisma modifier necrotic damage.

monster.description: Source: LaserLlama's Bard Colleges v2.1.0 p. 7 (Homebrew)
